law.history: Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 94, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 285, sec. 31, effective August 1, 1988. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 13, effective June 19, 1958. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4281e-13, 4281f-18, 4281g-15, 4281h-14, 4281i-7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Payment of excise tax under protest -- Actions to recover tax paid - Refund.
